channel.title: NOD32 and Kaspersky Anti Hacker Firewall
channel.description:
Ok... i need virus protection, I HAVE NONE(hack me please) and i heard these are good...
so i was wondering if anybody has the link to the downloads and cracks for: NOD32 and Kaspersky Anti Hacker Firewall...
i was going to download it off there site and try and get a crack but I'm not an American
Thanks a bunch, Bumross!
EDIT: found the crack for NOD32, i think its all good.... how do i know if its still the 30 day trial? still searching the forums for a kaspersky crack...
EDIT2: found kaspersky and crack, ive seen people sya that both of them put together is realy good but, when i go to install kaspersky it tells me that they dont work good together and its going to uninstall NOD32...
how can i keep both?

item.title: NOD32 and Kaspersky Anti Hacker Firewall
item.dc:creator: @leader leader
item.description:
@leader wrote:

[quote=“The Un-Named, post:11, topic:46014”][quote author=leader link=topic=64029.msg814291#msg814291 date=1169631378]

o thanks dude… i got it all good and running…

i have a-squared 2.0.0.428 without a serial or keyjen but thats probably alright… doubt i need it with kaspersky, NOD32 and zone alarm.

You don’t need two antivirus programs.
[/quote]

That made me laugh, it really did. You can NEVER rely on just 1 anti-virus program. I have seen every virus-scanner on virusscan.jotti.org miss something at one time. Apart from stupid things and not having internet, the most secure PC is one that changes virus scanner every few weeks and does regular scans.

PS, you can’t have more than 1 virus scanner/firewall, if the scanner/firewall is a good one it will tell you that you need to remove your old virus scanner first(not in those words). You can have multiple anti-spyware stuff and such.[/quote]

Antivirus + firewall = good protection.

Read full topic
item.source: NOD32 and Kaspersky Anti Hacker Firewall

item.title: NOD32 and Kaspersky Anti Hacker Firewall
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“leader, post:10, topic:46014”][quote author=bumr055 link=topic=64029.msg810815#msg810815 date=1169577739]
o thanks dude… i got it all good and running…

i have a-squared 2.0.0.428 without a serial or keyjen but thats probably alright… doubt i need it with kaspersky, NOD32 and zone alarm.
[/quote]

You don’t need two antivirus programs.[/quote]

That made me laugh, it really did. You can NEVER rely on just 1 anti-virus program. I have seen every virus-scanner on virusscan.jotti.org miss something at one time. Apart from stupid things and not having internet, the most secure PC is one that changes virus scanner every few weeks and does regular scans.

PS, you can’t have more than 1 virus scanner/firewall, if the scanner/firewall is a good one it will tell you that you need to remove your old virus scanner first(not in those words). You can have multiple anti-spyware stuff and such.

Read full topic

how do i make a keyfile…it wont accept a text doc saved as .key[br][size=1]Posted on: January 19, 2007, 10:24:13 AM[/size][hr]screw it ill just install mcafees

Macfee sucks, check serials.ws , I got my .key file from there.

item.title: NOD32 and Kaspersky Anti Hacker Firewall
item.dc:creator: @bumr055 bumr055
item.description:
@bumr055 wrote:

[quote=“The Un-Named, post:4, topic:46014”][quote author=bumr055 link=topic=64029.msg759587#msg759587 date=1168515581]
thanks, but… i went to install it and went to custom instead of complete and can not find anti hacker anything… it is version 6.0…

the only thing i see that isn’t anti-virus is proactive defense.
[/quote]

You need to download kaspersky anti-hacker seperate. This is what you should get, you’ll need to find a crack/key though[/quote]
i went to that link… but those are just pdf files not the actual download… do you know where i could get the download?

Read full topic
